response.original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Up And Away With Rainbow Dash
response.overview: The skies are clear and the sun is shining, up and away with Rainbow Dash!  You can be guaranteed a perfect day in Ponyville when Rainbow Dash is in town. She is responsible for managing the weather and keeping the skies free of clouds. Rainbow Dash is a VIP: A very important pony!Featuring 4 'Rainbow Dash' episodes from My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic.
response.title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Up And Away With Rainbow Dash
